mathematical_programming

Interface MP_Interface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FarmDyn, SwissLand, Toy, WeedControl

    public interface MP_Interface
    Contains the generic functions to allow the possible activities from the decision making process to be exported to the mathematical programming (MP) model.
    Author:
    kellerke

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Activity> getExitActivity()
      If agent leaves system then we set an exit activity.

    • Method Detail

      • inputsforMP

        void inputsforMP(Farm farm,
                 java.util.List<java.lang.String> possibleActivity)
        Generate the required input files for the gams MP model
        Parameters:
        farm - :: farm object
        possibleActivity - :: list of possible activities that this farm will send to the gams MP model

      • runModel

        void runModel(java.util.Properties cmd,
              int nFarms,
              int year,
              boolean pricingAverage,
              int memoryLengthAverage)
        Run the gams MP model based on the configuration we set in the inputsforMP model
        Parameters:
        cmd - :: command object based on control.properties file
        nFarms - :: how many farms we run in the system
        year - :: what simulation year we are testing (can change the run if it's the first iteration)
        pricingAverage - :: used in weedcontrol to set average pricing of wheat over previous iterations
        memoryLengthAverage - :: used to set how long agents remember (use average across group despite possible inter-farm variations)

      • readMPIncomes

        java.util.List<java.lang.Double> readMPIncomes(java.util.Properties cmd,
                                               java.util.List<Farm> allFarms)
        Read results from MP model with income of each agent
        Parameters:
        cmd - :: command object based on control.properties file
        allFarms - :: full list of farm agents in system
        Returns:
        :: return income list

      • readMPActivities

        java.util.List<java.util.ArrayList<Activity>> readMPActivities(java.util.Properties cmd,
                                                               java.util.List<Farm> allFarms)
        Read results from MP model with activities of each agent
        Parameters:
        cmd - :: command object based on control.properties file
        allFarms - :: full list of farm agents in system
        Returns:
        :: return activity list

      • getExitActivity

        java.util.ArrayList<Activity> getExitActivity()
        If agent leaves system then we set an exit activity. We want to keep the agent in the system, we just don't want further calculations for this agent
        Returns:
        :: activity list of exit activities for the specific MP model and agent
